com.ibm.aglets.tahiti.utils
Class ImagePanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.ibm.aglets.tahiti.utils.ImagePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ImagePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.image.ImageObserver

A panel able to load and show an image. This class is not localizable!

See Also:

Default constructor.

Parameters:
image - the image object.

ImagePanel

public ImagePanel(java.lang.String image)
Overloaded constructor. It try to load the image itself. You should use this to avoid image flicking problems. This method use all the capabilities of the ImageObserver.

Parameters:
image - the image file name
